name: SimpliRoute Inc.
description: Developer of a navigation platform designed for route optimization services. The company's platform provides ways to help any last-mile company make their deliveries efficiently by automating their process with an easy-to-use platform and automates their process with an easy-to-use platform, enabling businesses to organize their deliveries and visits with minimum effort.
